Item (autotransform.item.base)

The base class and associated classes for Item components. Can be used as a generic Item.

class autotransform.item.base.Item(key: str, extra_data: Optional[Mapping[str, Any]] = None)

Bases: abc.ABC

The base for Item components. Returned by Input components and act as the units on which AutoTransform operates.

_extra_data

Any extra data that needs to be associated with this Item.Should be JSON encodable.

Type

Optional[Mapping[str, Any]]

_key

A unique key used to represent this item, such as a file path.

Type

str

bundle() → autotransform.item.base.ItemBundle

Generates a JSON encodable bundle. If a component’s params are not JSON encodable this method should be overridden to provide an encodable version.

Returns

The encodable bundle.

Return type

ItemBundle

classmethod from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.item.base.Item

Produces an instance of the component from decoded data.

Parameters

data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle.

Returns

An instance of the Item.

Return type

Item

get_extra_data() → Optional[Mapping[str, Any]]

Gets the extra data associated with the Item.

Returns

The extra data associated with the Item.

Return type

Optional[Mapping[str, Any]]

get_key() → str

Gets the unique key that represents the Item.

Returns

The unique key representing the Item.

Return type

str

static get_type() → autotransform.item.type.ItemType

Used to map Item components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Item.

Return type

ItemType

class autotransform.item.base.ItemBundle

Bases: TypedDict

A bundled version of the Item object used for JSON encoding.

extra_data: typing_extensions.NotRequired[Mapping[str, Any]]
key: str
type: autotransform.item.type.ItemType
